metadata.title: CVE-2015-0841 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Off-by-one error in the readBuf function in listener.cpp in libcapsinetworkand monopd before 0.9.8, allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (crash) via a long line.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0841` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

monopd - 0.10.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: monopd package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.2-1').
